original_title: The Police - Live '79 at Hatfield Polytechnic
overview: The Police's performance on BBC's 'Rock Goes To College' programme, recorded at Hatfield College in February 1979. Tracklist :  01. Can't Stand Losing You  02. So Lonely  03. Fall Out  04. Hole In My Life  05. Truth Hits Everybody  06. Message in a Bottle  07. Peanuts  08. Roxanne  09. Next To You
title: The Police - Live '79 at Hatfield Polytechnic
